title: 4 Weirdest Starfield Traits!
description:

transcript_chunks.text: here are the four wackiest traits of Starfield Starfield gives you the option to give your created character unique traits and some of these traits are kind of wild the dream home trade gives you access to a customizable house and it's as glorious as it sounds you can get in their Animal Crossing style and organize furniture and the look of your house to your desire it's really cool the catch though is that it comes with a 125 000 credit mortgage that you have to pay weekly to the bank if that sounds like a lot of money it is hero worship gains you an adoring fan who shows up randomly to shower you with praises I brought him onto my crew and it's single-handedly been the biggest regret of my playthrough so far The Wanted trait puts a bounty on your head every now and then on Mercenaries will show up to try and kill you the good news though is that this trait allows you to do extra damage while you're on low Health finally the kids stuff treat gets you access to parents that love and

will show up to try and kill you the good news though is that this trait allows you to do extra damage while you're on low Health finally the kids stuff treat gets you access to parents that love and care for you you have to send them two percent of your credits every week but honestly that sounds like more than a reasonable amount to pay for unconditional affection for more coverage head to youtube.com kind of funny games for now
